value.title: StarCraft 2: DOMINATION - Serral gets CHEESED by Cure!
value.excerpt: Professional match of StarCraft 2 from the World Team League between Serral (Zerg) and Cure (Terran). Serral is the highest ranked pro gamer in the world, Cure is currently the number 3 overall. These games are overall pretty one-sided but they showcase the incredible skill that a select few players

value.title: StarCraft 2: GuMiho's NEW Cyclones vs Clem's Reapers! (Best-of-3)
